headline: EPR Properties: Strong Fundamentals, 6% Monthly Yield, And Upside Potential
summary: EPR Properties' recent earnings show improved FFO and AFFO, with a well-covered monthly dividend and a conservative payout ratio. Read why EPR stock is a Buy.
